channel.title: Comments on: Podcast 2: Dr. Waldron on the Doctrine of God

item.title: By: Robert Briggs
item.dc:creator: Robert Briggs
item.description: Enjoyed this little overview of Sam's course. He is spot on regarding the Trinity and the state of evangelicalism. The Doctrine of God is under immense attack on various fronts and it is good to be hitting some vitally important notes in contending for the faith in the contemporary scene.
item.content:encoded: Enjoyed this little overview of Sam’s course. He is spot on regarding the Trinity and the state of evangelicalism. The Doctrine of God is under immense attack on various fronts and it is good to be hitting some vitally important notes in contending for the faith in the contemporary scene.
